reviewText: The key to being to watch this fine set of classic Westerns is to purchase a relatively inexpensive all regions DVD player, which can easily be found via amazon. All it takes is to conduct a simple search.  This set is clearly labeled  in the PAL FORMAT, and not the American format. Buyers should notice those things before buying. That kind of error is no reason to give this set a low grade
This will not work in our machines, if only we had the machine to view these would be great.  Sitting on shelf and can't watch them, not happy
I had to throw this item out because I could never get the item I needed to be able to watch.
